meanings.definition: The practice or condition of having more than one wife at the same time.
meanings.sent1: In some cultures, polygyny is accepted and even encouraged.
meanings.sent2: Polygyny was common in ancient societies.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show joked about a man struggling to remember all his wives in a polygyny setup.
meanings.sent4: His love for gardening is like polygyny, always tending to multiple plants at once.
meanings.sent5: The image of polygyny is having a row of houses, each representing a wife, lined up neatly.

meanings.definition: The state or custom of having multiple wives.
meanings.sent1: Polygyny was practiced by some rulers to form political alliances.
meanings.sent2: The history book discussed the prevalence of polygyny in certain civilizations.
meanings.sent3: The sitcom portrayed a humorous scenario of a mix-up at a polygyny support group meeting.
meanings.sent4: Her overflowing bookshelf is a testament to her polygyny with literature, each book a beloved wife.
meanings.sent5: The painting depicted a majestic king surrounded by his polygyny of queens, each with a distinct expression.
